item.name: Magestorm: Mighty Battles in the Age of Magic
item.comment:
Nice idea, good quality of component and... it doesn't work. The game, despite of interesting universum, is boring. All type of units seems to be the same, scenerios have broken victory conditions, battles are broken too (roll a die, counting counting counting...., roll a die, counting counting counting...) only casting spells is giving some fun for players.If your want to play some turn strategy on hexes i strongly recommend Tide of Iron instead of Magestorm.
MH#14 dostałem za Britannie MH#16 oddałem za Hannibal Barkas
